mapper.select: select a.*,b.real_name ref_real_name from tb_user_detail a,tb_user_detail b where 1=1 and a.ref_phone = b.phone and a.phone = #{phone}
select a.*, (select sum(new_num) from ORDER_INFO t where t.user_code = a.user_code and t.order_status in ('1','2')) total_amnt from tb_user_detail a where 1=1 and a.phone = #{phone}
select a.*, (select sum(new_num) from ORDER_INFO t where t.user_code = a.user_code and t.order_status in ('1','2')) total_amnt from tb_user_detail a where 1=1 and a.user_name = #{userName}

select sum(tt) tNum, sum(lva) aNum, sum(lvb) bNum, sum(lvc) cNum from (select 1 as tt, case when rela_level='A' then 1 else 0 end as lva, case when rela_level='B' then 1 else 0 end as lvb, case when rela_level='C' then 1 else 0 end as lvc from tb_user_friendship where user_code =#{user_code}) a

SELECT a.phone, a.real_name, a.create_time, a.ref_phone, b.rela_level, b.recomuser_code, c.`status`, (select sum(new_num) from ORDER_INFO t where t.user_code = a.user_code and t.order_status in ('1','2')) total_amnt FROM tb_user_detail a, tb_user_friendship b,tb_user c where 1=1 AND a.user_code = b.recomuser_code And b.recomuser_code = c.user_code AND b.user_code = #{pd.user_code} and b.rela_level <>'' and b.rela_level is not NULL order by a.id desc
